articles.author: Chad Pergram
articles.title: Washington chooses its wars; Ukraine and Israel have made the cut despite opposition on right and left - Fox News
articles.description: History will judge whether the United States' involvement in wars in the Ukraine and Middle East was justified, just as it judged U.S. involvement in Central America or war in Iraq.
articles.content:
Washington, D.C., chooses its wars. And, for now, leaders in Washington have decided the U.S. has a vested interest in the war in Ukraine.
After months of consternation, lawmakers eventually approve… [+6749 chars]

articles.author: India Today News Desk
articles.title: 'You can't become CEO in America if you aren't Indian', quips US envoy - India Today
articles.description: With over 14 million Indians getting US visas in 2023 alone Ambassador Eric Garcetti said that America was preparing to accommodate even higher number of applications from Indian students this year
articles.content:
US Ambassador to India Eric Garcetti heaped praise on Indian IT and other professionals, aspirants landing dream jobs in top US companies.

articles.title: BHP Anglo American Bid: How the Offer Came Together. What Happens Next? - Bloomberg
articles.description: CEO Mike Henry is unlikely to drop his pursuit despite initial rejection by Anglo.
articles.content:
When Mike Henry took over as chief executive officer of BHP Group in 2020, the worlds biggest mining company had lost its swagger.
